Actions.Name: Delete from bot memory
Actions.Description: This operation is used to remove a piece of information from memory in the bot.

Actions.Name: Generate Adaptive Card
Actions.Description: This operation is used to a generate an adaptive card to be used later to display a list or carousel of cards.

Actions.Name: Get Bot Memory Items by Type
Actions.Description: Get all Bot Memory Items by Type.

Actions.Name: Save to bot memory
Actions.Description: This operation is used to save a piece of information to memory in the bot.

Actions.Name: Send Event
Actions.Description: This operation is used to a send an event to the bot client.

Actions.Name: Send reply
Actions.Description: This operation is used to a send a reply to the activity that triggered the flow.

Actions.Name: Send Adaptive Card reply
Actions.Description: This operation is used to a send an adaptive card reply to the activity that triggered the flow.

Actions.Name: Send Adaptive Card Set reply
Actions.Description: This operation is used to a send an adaptive card set reply to the activity that triggered the flow.  The set can be in either List or Carousel form.

Actions.Name: Start a new private conversation
Actions.Description: This operation is used to start a new private conversation with a user.

Actions.Name: Start a new group conversation
Actions.Description: This operation is used to start a new group conversation in a channel.

Actions.Name: Update an adaptive card sent to a tab
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update a card sent to a tab.

Actions.Name: Register chat bridge between two or more conversations
Actions.Description: This operation is used to initiate a chat bridge between two or more users.

Actions.Name: Get response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for input.

Actions.Name: Get adaptive card response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for input via adaptive card.

Actions.Name: Get choice response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for choice input.

Actions.Name: Get choice list response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for choice list input.

Actions.Name: Get datetime response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for datetime input.

Actions.Name: Get intent vector response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for NLP input.

Actions.Name: Get memory response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for bot memory input.

Actions.Name: Get people response from User
Actions.Description: This operation is used to ask the user for people picker input.

Actions.Name: When a keyword is used
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when the given keyword(s) are used by the bot.  Supply multiple keywords in semi-colon delimited format.

Actions.Name: When an intent vector is recognized
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when the given LUIS intent vector is recognized by the bot.
